home.problemP1: When you open a clinic, you have a thousand things on your mind. The last thing you need is to fight with a website that doesn't work or software that doesn't fit how you work.
home.problemP2: And if you've been running for a while, there are surely things that could be better: the schedule, the invoices, client follow-ups...
home.problemP3: We take care of the technology so you can focus on what matters: your clients.
home.servicesSubtitle: Simple tools that solve real problems
home.svcWebDesc: Your professional website that represents your business. Modern, fast and designed so your clients can find you.
home.svcCrmDesc: Manage your clients, appointments and follow-ups in one place. No complications, adapted to how you work.
home.svcBillingDesc: Generate invoices, track payments and keep your accounts clear. Forget Excel and paperwork.

home.aboutP2: We've been working with clinics, gyms and wellness centers for years. We know their real problems and how to solve them with technology that adapts to them.
home.ctaDesc: Tell us what you need. We'll prepare a no-obligation quote.

services.heroDesc: Websites, client management and billing. Everything custom-made, without features you don't need and without complications.
services.webDesc: A professional website that represents your business. No templates: custom design that builds trust and helps your clients find you.
services.webF0Desc: We don't use templates. Your website is designed from scratch to reflect your brand.
services.webF1Desc: Looks great on mobile, tablet and desktop. Most visits today come from mobile.
services.webF2Desc: We set up the basics so Google can find you: titles, descriptions, speed...
services.webF3Desc: We teach you how to change texts and images yourself. No depending on anyone.
services.crmDesc: Forget Excel spreadsheets and paper agendas. A simple system to manage your clients, appointments and follow-ups. Adapted to how you work, not the other way around.
services.crmF0Desc: All information for each client in one place: data, history, notes...
services.crmF1Desc: Visual calendar to manage your appointments. No mess or double bookings.
services.crmF2Desc: Automatic email or SMS reminders so you don't get stood up.
services.crmF3Desc: Save notes from each visit and keep the full history at hand.
services.billingDesc: Generate invoices in seconds, track who has paid and who hasn't, and keep your numbers clear. No complications or features you won't use.
services.billingF0Desc: Create an invoice in 30 seconds. Client data is already loaded.
services.billingF1Desc: See at a glance who owes you and who has paid. No surprises at the end of the month.
services.billingF2Desc: How much have you invoiced this month? And this quarter? Quick answers.
services.billingF3Desc: Get the data your accountant needs without going crazy.

portfolio.heroDesc: Real projects that have transformed the operations of clinics, gyms and wellness centers. Each solution is unique and designed to solve specific challenges.
portfolio.p1Desc: Comprehensive management system for a physiotherapy and wellness center. Corporate website with online booking, CRM for patient management, treatment histories, and pending session tracking.
portfolio.p1Quote: Before, we managed everything in Excel and paper agendas. Now we have each patient's history one click away and bookings happen automatically.
portfolio.p2Desc: Management platform for a gym with member control, fees, access, group classes and automated communication. Dashboard with retention metrics and monthly billing.
portfolio.p2Quote: The CRM changed our lives. We control payments, know who comes and who doesn't, and can act before a member cancels.
portfolio.p3Desc: Professional website for a yoga and pilates center. Modern design with facility gallery, class schedules, instructor team and trial class booking system.
portfolio.p3Quote: Our previous website looked like it was from the 90s. Now we convey the calm and professionalism we offer in our classes.
portfolio.p4Desc: Website for a nutrition practice with lead capture system. BMI calculator, dietary habits test, recipe blog and automated funnel with email marketing to convert visits into patients.
portfolio.p4Quote: The capture system works on its own. People come in, take the test, receive automatic emails and end up booking an appointment. It's magic.
portfolio.p5Desc: Billing application designed for freelancers in the fitness sector. Invoice creation in seconds, payment tracking, recurring fees, payment reminders and export for the accountant.
portfolio.p5Quote: I hated doing invoices. Now I generate them from my phone in seconds and I know nobody forgets to pay me because the system reminds them.
portfolio.p6Desc: Mobile application for parents who want to train at home. Short 15-20 minute routines, plans adapted to available time, progress tracking and fitness parents community.
portfolio.p6Quote: As a father of two small children, I didn't have time to go to the gym. ParentFit lets me train while they nap. Great.
portfolio.ctaSubtitle: Tell us your idea and we'll turn it into a solution that transforms your business

contact.faqSubtitle: Some answers to the most common questions.
contact.faq0Q: How long does a typical project take?
contact.faq0A: It depends on the scope, but an average project usually takes 2-4 months. We work with agile methodologies to deliver value from the first weeks.
contact.faq1Q: Does the price include post-delivery support?
contact.faq1A: Yes, all our projects include a warranty and support period. We also offer optional maintenance plans.
contact.faq2Q: Can I modify the software once delivered?
contact.faq2A: Absolutely. You receive the complete source code license. It's yours to modify, extend or adapt as you need.
contact.faq3Q: Do you work with centers of any size?
contact.faq3A: Yes, we work with both small clinics and large hospital networks. We adapt solutions to the size and needs of each organization.
contact.callDesc: Book a free 30-minute video call with our team.
